Text: Stick it to those M$ fuckers for trying to use the DMCA to coverup a scandalous document

> Stick it to those M$ fuckers for trying to use the DMCA to coverup a scandalous document.

Don't worry; those morons apparently haven't heard of the Streisand effect. By bringing attention to this they have all but guaranteed that the document will be widely circulated. Way to go, MS!
